"Talking Nerdy Since 1998"Specialists in local Arizona talent.Tech Finders is a 19 year old Scottsdale based, technical recruiting company. We specialize in finding hidden talent in the areas of Technical Management, Software / Web Development, Database Administration, SEO, Data Storage, Network Security, as well as other areas within Information Technology.  Specialties: .Net Developers, Java Developers, PHP, IT Sales, Unix / Windows Systems Administrators, Big Data, Network Engineers, Tech Support/Help Desk, Web Designers & Developers, Creative Marketing, Security, and IT Leadership.Our HR Division, HR Finders, assists in finding HR expertise in the areas of: Talent Acquisition, Benefits, Compensation, HR Executive Management, Recruitment, and Training.  Please think of us the next time you need an HR expert for a project, contract or direct hire need. www.hr-finders.com Our Accounting and Finance Division, Finance Finders, assists in finding a powerful network of finance and accounting professionals in the areas of:  Leadership, Analysts, Operations, Accountants, and Controllers. Whether you are looking for contract or direct hire professionals in this discipline, we will work with you to design an approach that works.Services: Full life-cycle recruiting, recruiting services on a contract or direct hire basis

Bringing the best to everyone we touch by being accountable, finding a way and choosing to learn and grow are some of the qualities that have made TERRA a success story in the Northwest. I am thrilled to have rejoined the TERRA team to open the new Phoenix Territory and replicate our previous success.  I am responsible for providing leadership to promote sales & operational growth and success within my territory, while striving to maintain the highest level of customer service to our candidates, clients, and community.   In addition, I develop professional relationships and support, motivate, train, retain and hold accountable all members of our Arizona team.

Technical Recruiter at Tech Finders, a 16 year old Scottsdale-based, technical recruiting company. We specialize in finding hidden talent in the areas of web development / design, database administration, SEO, content delivery, data storage, network security, project managers, IT Mangers, as well as, other areas within Information Technology.  Understanding culture is critical to what I do and I am a big believer in finding the right "fit" for both the employer and employee.

MDI Group focuses exclusively on providing IT Workforce Solutions that help organizations tackle ‘what’s next’ in terms of emerging technology projects and challenging business objectives. Services range from contract staff augmentation and project teams to contingent workforce management and MSP programs. For more than 25 years, MDI has delivered successful solutions by first seeking a thorough understanding of our clients, including their culture, processes and strategic goals. We then draw upon the broad technical knowledge base of our team members and the well-established connections in local markets we serve to provide the ‘best-fit’ solutions possible. Our "High Touch, Best Fit" approach makes us the top choice for our clients when it comes to achieving critical IT business objectives.

I am pleased to write this recommendation for Melissa and having directly supervised her for almost two years, I can say she is one of the hardest working recruiters I have worked with.  She is a tireless proponent for her clients and candidates alike and understands their needs and concerns easily.  Melissa possesses all the tributes of a great recruiter:  caring, great energy, honesty, follow through, she listens, has a great memory, has a positive mental attitude and most of all, she makes everyone feel special. She will be a great addition to any team.

I have had the pleasure of working with Melissa for the past 12 years.  For several of those years I was her direct manager.  The words that come to mind when I think of Melissa are driven, dedicated and determined. She has a super human capacity to produce and is able to maintain a laser focus on getting results while juggling the many, many competing demands that are inherent in this industry.  She has the ability to turn clients into fans because they know that she will do whatever it takes to deliver for them.  She has been with us since we were just a two office operation and now we are have six offices in two states.  She has been instrumental in the growth of the company and has been highly adaptable to all of the change that has happened during her tenure.  She is creative, innovative and readily embraces new methods.  She is leaving us to attend to family matters in another state and, while I fully support her, I hate to see her go.  She's a star.

I worked with Fae for my last two years at TERRA and it is my pleasure to write this recommendation for her.  From day one Fae was always supportive, motivating and encouraging-you always knew she had your back.  On top of that she knows how to drive business and is always eager to help with whatever you need.  Fae has the desire and ability to get to know her team,find out what motivates them and helps them to achieve it.  She always has a ready smile and is a great friend and boss.  I will miss working with her on a daily basis and will enjoy being remote friends with her instead.

Director of Human Resources at LabKey Software
August 31, 2012, Jennifer was a client of Melissa’s

I first started working with Jennifer when she was at ISB and have continued working with her through Landesa and now Integrated Diagnostics.  She is a pleasure to work with as a client and over the last few years has become a good friend.  One of the things I appreciate most about Jennifer is her compassion.  Jennifer is never judgmental and goes above and beyond the call of duty inside and outside of work when it comes to helping people.  The feedback I have received from the many employees I have placed with her is that she not only cares deeply about her employees, but is fun, knowledgeable and fully committed to helping her employees grow to their fullest potential.  On top of that, she is what I would consider a local expert in international HR and always my "go-to" person if I have any HR questions.  Jennifer is amazing and an inspiration.
